name: Whitehaven Rest and Relax Package
description: Tour the Whitsunday Islands from above in a Robinson 44 Helicopter. Visit one of the most beautiful beaches in the world, Whitehaven Beach, for a relaxing 1.5 hour stay with canapés and refreshing beverages. Take a walk on the stunning white sanded beach and visit the swirling sands of Hill Inlet, one of the most photographed locations in the world.
highlights: Scenic helicopter flight over Whitsunday Islands | 1.5 hour Whitehaven Beach visit | Hill Inlet views | Canapés and drinks included | Robinson 44 Helicopter
includes: Helicopter flight | 1.5hr beach stay | Canapés | Refreshing beverages
departure_location: Whitsunday Airport (Shute Harbour), 12 Air Whitsunday Road, Flametree, Queensland, Australia, 4802
ideal_for: Couples | Honeymooners | Photography enthusiasts | Luxury seekers
itinerary: **Fly Over: Shute Harbour** - Gateway to The Whitsundays with views of smaller reefs | **Fly Over: Long Island** - Closest island to mainland with fringing coral reefs | **Fly Over: Hamilton Island** - Popular island with resort and marina | **Fly Over: Whitsunday Island** - Largest island at 275km² | **Land: Whitehaven Beach (1.5hrs)** - Relax with canapés and beverages | **Fly Over: Hill Inlet** - Famous swirling sands | **Fly Over: Whitsunday Islands National Park** - Mountainous terrain and Dugong Beach | **Fly Over: South Molle Island** - Final island views before landing

name: 2 Hour Helicopter and Resort Visit Package
description: Jump on board Airlie Beach Helicopters newest tour! Your pilot will transfer you from Airlie Beach to one of the Whitsundays best kept secrets, Cape Gloucester. Take in the sights of nearby islands and reef systems before touching down on the beach for 1.5 hours, where you have full access to the resort for lunch, drinks, and a swim.
highlights: Scenic helicopter flight | Access to Cape Gloucester Resort | Relaxing beach time
itinerary: Fly Over: Airlie Beach and Cannonvale | Fly Over: Dryander Forest Reserve | Fly Over: Cape Gloucester | Land for 1hr 30 Minutes: Cape Gloucester Resort | Fly Over: Hideaway Bay | Fly Over: Dingo Beach
tags: helicopter tour, Cape Gloucester, resort visit, scenic flight

name: Heart Reef and Whitehaven Rest and Relax Package 2 Hour 30 Minute Helicopter and Island Visit Package
description: Dreamed of visiting Whitehaven Beach, or the gorgeous Heart Reef? This two and a half hour helicopter tour takes you to Whitehaven Beach for a one and a half hour stay, complete with nibblies and ice cold beverages. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Great Barrier Reef and the stunning Whitsunday Islands as you fly over iconic locations.
highlights: Whitehaven Beach visit | Heart Reef aerial view | Scenic helicopter flight
itinerary: Fly Over: Shute Harbour | Fly Over: South Molle Island | Fly Over: Whitsunday Island | Land for 1hr 30 Minutes: Whitehaven Beach | Fly Over: Whitehaven Beach | Fly Over: Hill Inlet | Fly Past: Whitsunday Islands towards Great Barrier Reef | Fly Over: Heart Reef | Fly Over: Bait Reef | Fly Over: Hayman Island | Fly Over: Hook Island | Fly Over: Molle Islands
important_info: Bring your camera for stunning views; check weather conditions before departure.
tags: helicopter tour, whitehaven beach, heart reef, great barrier reef

name: Whitsunday Whirl 20 Minute Helicopter Tour
description: Experience the breathtaking views of Airlie Beach, Shute Harbour, and the surrounding islands and reef systems on this scenic 20-minute helicopter tour. Departing from Shute Harbour Airport, you'll soar above the clear turquoise waters, capturing stunning sights that showcase why this part of Australia is so beloved by visitors from around the world.
highlights: Scenic helicopter flight | Breathtaking views | Iconic Whitsunday Islands
itinerary: Fly over Funnel Bay and Airlie Beach | Fly over Pioneer Bay | Fly over Pioneer Rocks and Almora reef | Fly over North Molle Island | Fly past Daydream Island | Fly over South Molle Island | Fly past Mount Rooper | Fly past Shute Harbour, Shute Reef, and White Rock Reef | Land back at the Whitsunday Airport | Fly past Long Island | Fly over Shute Harbour | Fly over Long Island | Fly over North and South Molle Islands | Fly over Airlie Beach
important_info: Be sure to have a camera for stunning views.

name: Whitehaven From Above Tour 30 Minute Helicopter Tour
description: Experience one of Australia’s most iconic landmarks, Whitehaven Beach, from the sky. This breathtaking helicopter tour offers stunning views of the 74 Whitsunday Islands, including the famous Hill Inlet, known for its swirling sands and turquoise waters. Capture the beauty of the pure white sands and vibrant coral reefs as you soar above this picturesque paradise.
highlights: Stunning aerial views | Fly over Whitehaven Beach | Experience Hill Inlet
departure_location: Whitsunday Airport (Shute Harbour), 12 Air Whitsunday Road, Flametree, Queensland, Australia, 4802
itinerary: Fly Over: Shute Harbour | Fly Over: South Molle Island | Fly Over: Whitsunday Island | Fly Over: Whitehaven Beach | Fly Over: Hill Inlet | Fly Past: Whitsunday Island National Park | Fly Over: Molle Islands
important_info: Make sure to have your camera ready for stunning views.
tags: helicopter tour, Whitehaven Beach, Whitsunday Islands

name: Reef and Whitehaven Spectacular 60 Minute Helicopter Tour
description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of The Whitsunday Islands and The Great Barrier Reef from above on this one-hour helicopter tour. Departing from Shute Harbour, you'll soar over iconic sights like Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet, and the famous Heart Reef, capturing stunning views that are sure to leave you in awe.
highlights: Bird's eye view of The Whitsunday Islands | Scenic flight over Whitehaven Beach | Visit to Heart Reef
itinerary: Fly Over: Shute Harbour | Fly Over: South Molle Island | Fly Over: Whitsunday Island | Fly Over: Whitehaven Beach | Fly Over: Hill Inlet | Fly Past: Whitsunday Islands towards Great Barrier Reef | Fly Over: Heart Reef | Fly Over: Bait Reef | Fly Over: Hayman Island | Fly Over: Hook Island | Fly Over: Molle Islands
tags: helicopter tour, great barrier reef, whitsunday islands
